query.statement:
SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT (SURVEYGBN || TRIM(TO_CHAR( INTEGER(SURVEYID), '00000')) || '000' || '000' ) AS IDX ,('[' || SURVEYNM || ']') AS NM ,1 AS LEVEL ,SURVEYGBN, SURVEYID, 0 AS QUESTNO, 0 AS QUESTSEQ ,'' AS MANY, '' AS TYPE ,CAST('' AS VARCHAR(3000) ) AS ANSWER FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTSRYM WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SURVEYGBN = #SURVEYGBN# AND SURVEYID = #SURVEYID#
UNION ALL
SELECT (SURVEYGBN || TRIM(TO_CHAR( INTEGER(SURVEYID), '00000')) || TRIM(TO_CHAR(QUESTNO, '000')) || '000' ) AS IDX ,'¢º' || LPAD(QUESTNO, 6, ' ') || '. ' || QUESTNM AS NM ,2 AS LEVEL ,SURVEYGBN, SURVEYID, QUESTNO, 0 AS QUESTSEQ ,MANY, TYPE ,CAST('' AS VARCHAR(3000) ) AS ANSWER FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTSRYD WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SURVEYGBN = #SURVEYGBN# AND SURVEYID = #SURVEYID#
UNION ALL
SELECT (A.SURVEYGBN || TRIM(TO_CHAR( INTEGER(A.SURVEYID), '00000')) || TRIM(TO_CHAR(A.QUESTNO, '000')) || TRIM(TO_CHAR(A.QUESTSEQ, '000')) ) AS IDX ,'-' || LPAD(A.QUESTSEQ, 11, ' ') || ') ' || A.QUESTNM AS NM ,3 AS LEVEL ,A.SURVEYGBN, A.SURVEYID, A.QUESTNO, A.QUESTSEQ ,B.MANY, B.TYPE ,CAST('' AS VARCHAR(3000) ) AS ANSWER FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTSRYQ AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTSRYD AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.SURVEYGBN = B.SURVEYGBN AND A.SURVEYID = B.SURVEYID AND A.QUESTNO = B.QUESTNO
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.SURVEYGBN = #SURVEYGBN# AND A.SURVEYID = #SURVEYID#
) T
ORDER BY T.IDX
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
